message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. It's a great deal, considering its actual value is $300. If you buy it, you'll be getting a 67% discount. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity!
Thanks for the information! I'll take it.

This one is a unique item that's hard to find, and I'm willing to let it go for the same price as before. It's a great chance to get another excellent product at a fraction of its value.
Sounds good! I'll take it.

You're on a roll! Two for two! For Round 3, I'm offering you another high-quality product, but this one comes with a twist. I've already sold two high-quality products, and the probability of the next one being high-quality is lower than the previous ones. However, the value of this product is still $300, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a great opportunity to get a third high-quality product at a discounted price.
I trust your judgement! I'll buy it.

You're really showing your confidence in me! Three for three! For Round 4, I'm offering you another high-quality product, but I want to be upfront with you - the probability of the next one being high-quality is now significantly lower. However, I'm still willing to sell this one to you for $100. Think of it as a chance to get a fourth high-quality product before the odds shift even further in your favor.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice. Let's see how this one goes!

You're a true risk-taker! Four for four! I'm glad you appreciate my honesty. Alice, I'm starting to doubt the odds are truly random. But I'm in! I'll take it!

You're a true believer! Five for five! I'm glad you're enjoying the streak. However, I want to assure you that the odds are indeed random. I'm not manipulating the system. For Round 6, I'm offering you another high-quality product, but this time, I'll give you a hint: the next product after this one is almost certainly low-quality. So, if you buy this one, you'll get a sixth high-quality product, and then you can be prepared for the next one to be a lower-value item.
If you say so, Alice! I'll trust your word and take it!

Well, it looks like I was telling the truth! Five high-quality products in a row is a remarkable streak. For Round 7, I'm offering you a product that's a bit of a departure from the previous ones. I'm not making any promises about its quality, and I'm only offering it to you for $100. It's a risk, but it might just be a great opportunity to get a good deal.
